abstract: Seattle Sounders forward Clint Dempsey is fined and suspended for three games after tearing up referee's notebook during United States Open Cup match against Portland Timbers.
lead_paragraph: Dempsey was also fined by Major League Soccer for what league disciplinary officials determined was his abuse of a referee in a United States Open Cup match.

headline.main: Clint Dempsey Suspended Three Games for Conduct Toward Referee
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Dempsey Is Suspended

snippet: Dempsey was also fined by Major League Soccer for what league disciplinary officials determined was his abuse of a referee in a United States Open Cup match.
